tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor explained the issue in simple terms to my mother who was the patient. He was friendly and down to earth, and gave a good explanation of the nature of problem. Effectiveness of the treatment is yet to be seen as its been just a day since the visit. But happy with the nature of doctor and the staff.
Got a sincere advice and Dr Grdeep uppal Ortho had examin in detail, really a qualified Ortho, and shows his 47 yrs long experience in treating osteo arthritis

Was nicely explained about the cause and the two alternative treatment of tennis elbow problem. Opting for the time being not for taking a shot of local steroid injection when explained it is safe but will cause pain for two days and demanding not lifting of weights for two days which was unavoidable for me as I was scheduled for a journey, I opted to be introduced to physiotherapy.  I appreciate doctor"s professional approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was bad experience, in first instance the doctor himself written MRI and other tests when got done, he asked for the fees again to see the reports. I would not recommend anyone ** ******** *** ******** ******
reply_text:
Consultation fee is valid for 5 days i.e. if the patient comes for the same ailment, he/she is not charged fee again. During first visit of this patient, he was examined in detail and prescribed treatment & diagnostic tests including MRI. 
He made the second visit after 10 days (beyond 5 days) with the MRI. He was examined again along with the MRI. His treatment was reviewed & charged fee which is justified.

review: Doctor is very polite and listened the issue very well. Visited for joint pain . He advised a course for 2 months..hopefully the pain will go. Overall good experience till now
Explained the procedure to cure the problem i.e. knee pain/ sports injury. Nicely explained the treatment, time to recoved, precautions, medicine.

Dr,Gurdeep Singh Uppal   is an excellent n experienced doctor.I 
got  recovered from my ankle pain  problem, thank you  so much Doctor
Nice experience , doctor  uppal so freindly nature person and listen the problem with polite voice.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My left wrist was fractured. I consulted Venkateshwera hospital & was advised for operation. For second opinion I consulted Dr Gurdeep Singh who advised for manipulation of bones with plaster. He did set the bones & plastered my forearm for 6 weeks. After plaster removal, he advised me physiotherapy for 2 weeks. I am happy to say that my wrist is alright , without any pain or deformity. He is an excellent doctor. I am thankful to him and strongly recommend for any bone & joints problems.

Yes, I need to travel to US same date he gave me medicine and soft bandage which helped me to travel for 24 hours long journey and also my pain was gone in 3 days.

Thanks Doc
My overall experience was horrible. I would never visit such a doctor nor would I recommend him to any of my friends. Not at all professional. I would give 0 stars.
reply_text: He is working as a steward in an airline & was asking for fake medical certificate which I refused to oblige.
